dct_description_sm: India. Ministry of Transport. Tourist Division. Alternate title: Guide map of Banaras. Some buildings are shown pictorially. Inset map: Sarnath. Printed by Messers. Bombay Fine Art Offset and Litho works, Bombay 27. - April, 1957. Verso: Sites of touristic interest are located.
